feed.title: Movary Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Movary: 0.64.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fix docker healthcheck by @leepeuker in https://github.com/leepeuker/movary/pull/635

Full Changelog: https://github.com/leepeuker/movary/compare/0.64.0...0.64.1

entry.title: New release for Movary: 0.65.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Feature: Create API endpoint to add new movie via tmdb by @leepeuker in https://github.com/leepeuker/movary/pull/646
  • Fix: Skip movies during trakt import with invalid tmdb ids by @leepeuker in https://github.com/leepeuker/movary/pull/637
  • Fix: Don't convert $watchDate to string during diary import by @alexcaza in https://github.com/leepeuker/movary/pull/638
  • Fix: Build correct radarr feed API URL by @alexcaza in https://github.com/leepeuker/movary/pull/639
  • Fix: Fix broken API token authorization by @leepeuker in https://github.com/leepeuker/movary/pull/647
  • Maintenance: Upgrade third party dependencies by @leepeuker in https://github.com/leepeuker/movary/pull/645

New Contributors

  • @alexcaza made their first contribution in https://github.com/leepeuker/movary/pull/638

Full Changelog: https://github.com/leepeuker/movary/compare/0.64.1...0.65.0

entry.title: New release for Movary: 0.66.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Feature: Add Kodi integration to automatically logged watched movies by @leepeuker in https://github.com/leepeuker/movary/pull/654
  • Feature: Add production countries information to movie data by @leepeuker in https://github.com/leepeuker/movary/pull/651
  • Feature: Add dashboard row for most watched production countries by @leepeuker in https://github.com/leepeuker/movary/pull/652
  • Maintenance: During tmdb sync keep production companies up to date by @leepeuker in https://github.com/leepeuker/movary/pull/649
  • Maintenance: Store country iso codes completely locally vs fetching and caching from tmdb remotly by @leepeuker in https://github.com/leepeuker/movary/pull/650

Full Changelog: https://github.com/leepeuker/movary/compare/0.65.0...0.65.1

entry.title: New release for Movary: 0.66.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fix: Implement correct handling of custom application urls by @leepeuker in https://github.com/leepeuker/movary/pull/656

Full Changelog: https://github.com/leepeuker/movary/compare/0.66.0...0.66.1

entry.title: New release for Movary: 0.66.2
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fix: Improve application url js handling by @leepeuker in https://github.com/leepeuker/movary/pull/657
  • Fix: Repair application url handling on server settings page by @leepeuker in https://github.com/leepeuker/movary/pull/658

Full Changelog: https://github.com/leepeuker/movary/compare/0.66.1...0.66.2
